mapper.select: SELECT VIDEO.VIDEO_ID ,VIDEO.USER_ID ,VIDEO.VIDEO_HEAD ,VIDEO.VIDEO_TEXT ,VIDEO.VIDEO_PATH ,VIDEO.VIDEO_IMG ,VIDEO.VIDEO_CLASS ,VIDEO.VIDEO_DURATION ,VIDEO.VIDEO_TIME ,CLASS.VIDEO_CLASS_NAME AS VIDEO_CLASS_NAME FROM AMTF_VIDEO VIDEO LEFT JOIN AMTF_VIDEO_CLASS CLASS ON VIDEO.VIDEO_CLASS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',CLASS.VIDEO_CLASS_NAME),'%') WHERE CLASS.VIDEO_CLASS_NAME = #{getclass} LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM AMTF_VIDEO WHERE VIDEO_HEAD LIKE "%"#{video_head}"%" AND VIDEO_ID != #{video_id} LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM AMTF_VIDEO ORDER BY VIDEO_TIME LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM AMTF_VIDEO_COMMENT WHERE VIDEO_ID = #{video_id} ORDER BY VIDEO_COMMENT_TIME
SELECT * FROM AMTF_VIDEO_COMMENT_REPLY WHERE VIDEO_ID = #{video_id} AND VIDEO_COMMENT_ID = #{video_comment_id} ORDER BY VIDEO_COMMENT_REPLY_TIME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AMTF_VIDEO_COMMENT_PRAISE WHERE VIDEO_ID = #{video_id} AND VIDEO_COMMENT_ID = #{video_comment_id}
SELECT * FROM AMTF_VIDEO WHERE VIDEO_HEAD LIKE "%"#{video_head}"%" LIMIT 8

SELECT VIDEO.VIDEO_ID ,VIDEO.USER_ID ,VIDEO.VIDEO_HEAD ,VIDEO.VIDEO_TEXT ,VIDEO.VIDEO_PATH ,VIDEO.VIDEO_IMG ,VIDEO.VIDEO_CLASS ,VIDEO.VIDEO_DURATION ,VIDEO.VIDEO_TIME ,SUM(PRAISE.VIDEO_ID) AS SUMS FROM AMTF_VIDEO VIDEO LEFT JOIN AMTF_VIDEO_COMMENT_PRAISE PRAISE ON VIDEO.VIDEO_ID = PRAISE.VIDEO_ID GROUP BY VIDEO.VIDEO_ID ORDER BY SUMS DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT VIDEO.VIDEO_ID ,VIDEO.USER_ID ,VIDEO.VIDEO_HEAD ,VIDEO.VIDEO_TEXT ,VIDEO.VIDEO_PATH ,VIDEO.VIDEO_IMG ,VIDEO.VIDEO_CLASS ,VIDEO.VIDEO_DURATION ,VIDEO.VIDEO_TIME FROM AMTF_VIDEO VIDEO ORDER BY VIDEO.VIDEO_TIME DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM AMTF_VIDEO_HISTORY WHERE VIDEO_ID = #{video_id} AND USER_ID = #{user_id} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE AMTF_VIDEO_HISTORY SET VIDEO_HISTORY_TIME = NOW() WHERE VIDEO_ID = #{video_id} AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AMTF_VIDEO_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} LIMIT 10
